name: supercookie
readme_summary: The "supercookie" repository demonstrates a browser fingerprinting technique that utilizes favicons to assign a unique and persistent identifier to website visitors. This method circumvents traditional tracking countermeasures like clearing cache, incognito mode, VPNs, and ad blockers, raising privacy concerns.
key_features: Circumvention of common privacy measures (incognito mode, cache clearing, VPNs, ad blockers)
Docker and local machine installation options
primary_use_case: Demonstration and education regarding favicon-based browser fingerprinting techniques and their potential privacy implications.
cover_image_prompt: A mischievous gremlin artist secretly painting unique patterns onto tiny house-shaped cookies (favicons) on a vast conveyor belt representing the internet. Each cookie is subtly different, creating a unique identifier. The cookies are then placed on miniature websites that travel down the belt. The gremlin works in a dimly lit, futuristic workshop filled with glowing screens displaying browser code. The scene should be in a whimsical, slightly unsettling digital painting style with vibrant colors and sharp details. The composition is focused on the gremlin and the cookie conveyor belt, with subtle tech elements in the background.

name: lodestone
description: A free, open source server hosting tool for Minecraft and other multiplayer games
readme_summary: Lodestone is an open-source server hosting tool designed for Minecraft and other multiplayer games. It aims to provide an easy-to-use, secure, and feature-rich experience for server management, with a focus on collaborative remote management and user permission controls.
key_features: Collaborative remote server and resource management
primary_use_case: Hosting and managing game servers, particularly Minecraft, with a focus on ease of use and security.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly robot butler meticulously managing a miniature cityscape of Minecraft servers. The butler uses a holographic interface to monitor server performance, represented by glowing data streams flowing between the buildings. One hand holds a wrench, subtly adjusting settings, while the other presents a tray of neatly organized server configurations. Small UI elements float around the scene, displaying server status and resource usage. The scene is set in a clean, futuristic workshop with soft, ambient lighting. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and clear details.

name: fuji-web
description: Fuji is an AI agent that lives in your browser's sidepanel. You can now get tasks done online with a single command!
readme_summary: Fuji-Web is an AI agent that operates within a browser sidepanel, enabling users to automate online tasks through simple commands. It leverages AI to understand user intent, autonomously navigate websites, and execute tasks while providing explanations for each step.
key_features: Task execution based on user intent
Integration with OpenAI and Anthropic APIs
primary_use_case: Automating online tasks within a web browser using AI.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled navigator in a ship's control room, guiding a miniature ship representing a web browser through a vast ocean of websites. The navigator uses a glowing AI interface to chart the course and automate tasks, with data streams flowing from the interface to the ship. Small screens display website interfaces and code snippets. The scene is set in a brightly lit, futuristic control room. The composition is focused and clear, with a blue and white color scheme. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: flint
description: Lightweight tool for managing linux virtual machines
readme_summary: Flint is a lightweight KVM management tool designed for developers, sysadmins, and home labs. It provides a modern web UI, CLI, and API for managing virtual machines, emphasizing simplicity and efficiency by avoiding XML and bloat.
primary_use_case: Managing KVM virtual machines with a focus on simplicity and efficiency.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled architect overseeing a city of virtual machines, each represented by a glowing building. The architect uses a tablet displaying a clean, modern UI to manage the city's resources, represented by flowing streams of data. The city is powered by a central KVM core, radiating a soft, blue light. Small screens on the buildings display performance metrics and resource allocation. The repository name, 'Flint,' is subtly integrated into the cityscape as a landmark. The scene is set in a futuristic control room with a blue and orange color scheme. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: go-whatsapp-web-multidevice
description: GOWA - WhatsApp REST API with support for UI, Webhooks, and MCP. Built with Golang for efficient memory use.
readme_summary: The go-whatsapp-web-multidevice repository provides a WhatsApp REST API built with Golang, offering efficient memory use and support for UI, Webhooks, and MCP (Model Context Protocol). It allows developers to integrate WhatsApp functionality into their applications, including sending messages, managing contacts, and receiving updates via webhooks.
key_features: Send WhatsApp messages via HTTP API
Send Stickers (automatic WebP conversion and resizing)
primary_use_case: Integrating WhatsApp functionality into applications via a REST API, enabling automated messaging, notifications, and chatbot interactions.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a diligent messenger bird, equipped with a tiny smartphone, delivering scrolls of messages to various interconnected devices scattered across a vibrant, futuristic cityscape. The bird effortlessly navigates through the digital landscape, symbolizing the seamless message delivery facilitated by the API. Small screens on the devices display snippets of WhatsApp conversations and API calls. Glowing particles flow from the bird's phone, representing data packets. The repository name, 'GoWA,' is subtly displayed on a building. The scene is set at twilight, casting a warm glow. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.
